title: LA-23-04: Summary of Ethics Legislation (117th Congress)

summary:
This Legal Advisory provides a high-level summary of notable legislation in the 117th Congress. 

Notes: [Note: Advisory has been modified regarding requirements of PL 117-348, Trafficking Victims Prevention Protection Act of 2022]
